attributes.action: Replace the obnoxious, Chris Moyles Radio One DJ.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We've all suffered long enough this man has gone past his sell by date, I used to be a fan but now I'm just bored with the "Saviour of Radio One" it's time for a change and please no Scott Mills he's almost as bad!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
